[TWOI]112-twoi HAD ALWAYS HATED [THE THREE - HOUR DRUVE BETWEEN [Austin]15-austin and [Houston]10-houston]358-the three - hour druve between austin and houston . [I]0-i had realized early in life that too much of anything was n't good for [you]360-you , and that included beauty . [I]0-i 'd had the good luck to be born moderately pretty , with blue eyes and blond hair , and a milk - colored complexion that , when exposed to the cruel blaze of the Texas sun , went straight to sizzling - red . " * * * [JACK FEATURED PROMINENTLY]122-jack IN [MANY OF HAVEN]196-haven 'S childhood stories . [The only child of [Churchill Travis]124-churchill 's first marriage]2870-the only child of churchill travis 's first marriage , [Gage]142-gage had worked hard to please [[his]142-gage father]695-his father , to become [the perfect son]2872-the perfect son . [He]142-gage had an innate kindness , an allowance for human frailty , that [Churchill Travis]124-churchill found difficult to summon . [Churchill]124-churchill 's second marriage had lasted until the death of [[his]124-churchill wife]2677-his wife , [Ava]197-ava , and had produced [three children]2877-three children : [Jack]122-jack , [Joe]198-joe , and [Haven]196-haven . Since [Gage]142-gage already shouldered the main burden of expectation and responsibility , [Jack]122-jack had the opportunity to play , experiment , run wild , make [friends]383-friends . [He]122-jack had always been [the first to jump into a fight]2879-the first to jump into a fight and [the first to shake hands afterward]2880-the first to shake hands afterward . [He]122-jack 'd played every sport , charmed [[his]122-jack teachers]2881-his teachers into giving [him]122-jack better grades than [he]122-jack deserved , and dated [the prettiest girls in [school]422-school]2882-the prettiest girls in school . When [Churchill]124-churchill had decided [[his]124-churchill young sons]2886-his young sons needed to be reminded what hard labor was , [he]124-churchill set [them]2886-his young sons to laying sod in the blistering [south Texas]9-texas sun , or building a hand - cut stone fence along the edge of [[their]2886-his young sons property]2887-their property , until [their]2886-his young sons muscles were on fire and a dark tan had saturated [their]2886-his young sons skin several layers down . Of [the three boys]2888-the three boys , only [Jack]122-jack had truly enjoyed the outside labor . Sweat , dirt , physical exertion — had all felt purifying to [him]122-jack . [His]122-jack basic need to test [himself]122-jack against [the land]2889-the land , and nature , manifested in a lifelong love of outdoor pursuits : hunting , fishing , anything that took [him]122-jack away from [the air - conditioned opulence of [River Oaks]43-river oaks]2890-the air - conditioned opulence of river oaks . [Haven]196-haven had been spared these particular life lessons from [[her]196-haven father]2891-her father . Instead , [she]196-haven had been subjected to [[her]196-haven mother]2892-her mother 's notions of how to bring up [a girl to be ladylike]2893-a girl to be ladylike . [Naturally Haven]199-haven had been [a tomboy]2894-a tomboy , forever trailing after [[her]196-haven three brothers]2895-her three brothers . Because of the significant age difference between [Gage]142-gage and [Haven]199-haven , [he]122-jack had assumed a vaguely paternal role , intervening on [her]196-haven behalf when [he]122-jack deemed it necessary . But [Jack]122-jack had warred with [Haven]199-haven on many occasions , such as when [she]199-haven had gone uninvited into [[his]122-jack room]2896-his room or played with [his]122-jack train set without asking . For revenge , [he]122-jack had given [her]199-haven Indian burns , and when [she]199-haven had tattled on [him]122-jack , [[their]2897-their daddy]2898-their daddy had beaten [him]122-jack with [his]122-jack belt until [Haven]199-haven had cried . Schooled in the Texan art of manliness , [Jack]122-jack had prided [himself]122-jack on not shedding one tear . Afterward , [Churchill]124-churchill had told [[his]124-churchill wife]2677-his wife [Ava]197-ava that [Jack]122-jack was [the most stubborn boy alive]2900-the most stubborn boy alive . "[199-haven] Too damn much like [me]0-i , " [the father]334-the father had said , frustrated that [he]124-churchill could not motivate the rebellious [Jack]122-jack the way [he]124-churchill had with [Gage]142-gage . There had been no promises . "Do[0-i] [you]0-i think that 's possible ? " [Haven]199-haven asked softly . "I[0-i] do n't know , " [I]0-i said . "[0-i] [I]0-i may have to try it . "[199-haven]

TWENTY - TWOIN THE MORNING [I]0-i WOKE [UP]258-up alone AND WENT INTO [THE main room]1113-the main room . There was a protesting squeak beneath [my]0-i foot . [I]0-i reached down to pick up [Luke]117-luke 's stuffed bunny . Holding the bunny tightly , [I]0-i sat on the sofa and wept . But it was n't the good , gusty cry [I]0-i needed , only a slow anguished drizzle . [I]0-i took a shower , standing in the hot water for a long time . [I]0-i realized that no matter how far away from [me]0-i [Tara]108-tara was , no matter where [she]108-tara and [Luke]117-luke were or what [they]2103-they did , [I]0-i would still love [them]2103-they . [No one]2312-no one could take that from [me]0-i . [Tara]108-tara and [I]0-i were [fellow survivors]2105-fellow survivors , responding to [our]2106-us wasteland of a childhood in opposite ways . [She]108-tara feared being alone just as much as [I]0-i feared not being alone . It was entirely possible that time would prove [us]2106-us both wrong , and the secret of happiness would always elude [us]2106-us . All [I]0-i knew for certain was that the boundary of isolation was the only thing that had ever kept [me]0-i safe . [I]0-i dressed and put [my]0-i hair in a ponytail , and [I]0-i began to fold [my]0-i clothes in neat piles on the bed . The phone stayed silent . [I]0-i guessed that [Jack]122-jack had given up on calling [me]0-i , which made [me]0-i perplexed and uneasy . As much as [I]0-i did n't want to talk about [Luke]117-luke , or how [I]0-i was feeling , [I]0-i wanted to know how [Jack]122-jack was . As the local news came on , the weather forecast showed a storm pattern forming in [the Gulf]86-the gulf . That would make it a bumpy return ride for [the Travis brothers]2107-the travis brothers , unless [they]2107-the travis brothers had gotten in front of the system . A half hour after the first report , [the tropical depression]2108-the tropical depression had been upgraded to a forty - five - mile - per - hour storm .
